error.report: Continuing anyways and refreshing your browser may resolve the issue. If not, please take a screenshot of your browser window and email it along with a description of what you were doing to your support team or
error.script: Refresh your browser to resolve this error...
error.title: Unfortunately it appears an error has occured...

bundle.name: Nombre de la Colección
bundle.explanation: Colecciones son grupo de uno o mas feeds GTFS que forman la red de tránsito de una red base
bundle.failure: Error procesando GTFS. POr favor cargue un archivo GTFS válido .zip files.
bundle.deleteConfirmation: Está seguro que desea eliminar ésta colección? los proyectos relacionados dejarán de funcionar.
bundle.processing: Espere hasta que se complete el procesamiento antes de salir de esta página. Esto puede tomar unos pocos minutos.
bundle.notice: Después de hacer clic en  "Crear," Deberá esperar unos minutos para que se procesen los feeds GTFS.

nav.notConnectedToInternet: Usted no está conectado a Internet
nav.unfinishedRequests: Tiene procesos sin finalizar. Está seguro que desa salir?

phasing.disabled: Phasing is disabled when a modification is bidirectional or a timetable uses exact times.
phasing.headwayMismatchWarning: Warning! The selected timetable's %(selectedTimetableHeadway) minute headway does not equal this timetable's headway, which could cause unintended behavior.
phasing.noAvailableStopsWarning: The selected timetable does not contain stops available to phase from!
phasing.exactTimesWarning: Exact times is not available because phasing is enabled on this timetable.

r5Version.analysisVersionDifferent: WARNING! You have completed regional analyses with a different routing engine. Using different routing engines may change results.
r5Version.comparisonIsDifferent: WARNING! The analyses you are comparing ran on different routing engines. Changes in accessibility may be due to differences in the routing engines, rather than the transport scenarios.
r5Version.latestReleaseVersionNotSelected: An updated version of the Routing engine is available. Changing versions should improve performance but may change analysis results.
r5Version.title: Routing engine
r5Version.showRelease: Show only stable routing engine versions
r5Version.invalidVersion: Version %(version) is not a valid version. Please select an option > %(minimum).

region.name: Nombre de Región
region.configure: Configurar ajustes compartidos para la región
region.deleteConfirmation: ¿Estás seguro de que deseas eliminar esta región? Esto eliminará todos los proyectos y modificaciones asociados.
region.versionOutdated: Una versión actualizada del backend de Analysis está disponible. Para evitar errores, seleccione la última versión en
region.boundsNotice: Los límites se ajustarán a puntos en una cuadrícula regular.
region.updatesDisabled: Las actualizaciones de OSM se han deshabilitado temporalmente y se moverán a la página de administración de paquetes.

statusCode.PROJECTING_CENSUS: Projecting Census data to project grid…

project.createActionTooltip: Cada proyecto requiere un nombre y un paquete GTFS asociado. Una vez que se crea un proyecto, su paquete asociado no se puede cambiar.
project.name: Nombre del Proyecto
project.deleteConfirmation: Está seguro de eliminar éste proyecto?
project.noBundles: Para crear proyectos en ésta región, primero debe crear una colección de GTFSs.
project.goToExisting: i r a un proyecto existente

variant.description: Un escenario es una colección de modificaciones dentro de un proyecto.
variant.name: Escenario
variant.enterName: Ingrese el nombre de su escenario:
variant.showModifications: Mostrar modificaciones para este escenario en el mapa
variant.deleteConfirmation: ¿Estás seguro de que deseas eliminar este escenario? El procedimiento eliminará las referencias a él de todas las modificaciones.
variant.export: Seleccione un escenario para descargar o compartir
variant.exportExplanation: Genera un JSON con la representación del escenario, GeoJSON para mapear nuevas características en GIS, o un resúmen imprimible del escenario.

transitEditor.bidirectionalWarning: Modification cannot be bidirectional because timetables in this modification have phasing information.
transitEditor.fromStopLabel: Start of reroute/extension (existing stop on pattern)
transitEditor.toStopLabel: End of reroute/extension (existing stop on pattern)
transitEditor.instructions: Click the map to add a new stop in a fixed location. Click an existing segment to add a stop to it. Click on a stop to delete it or change it into a control point, which helps define the alignment. Click an auto-created stop to fix its location.
transitEditor.snappedStopDescription: New stop snapped to existing stop

shapefile.invalidMultiLineString: MultiLineString feature in input shapefile has disjoint segments, cannot process.
shapefile.invalidShapefileType: Shapefile type must be LineString or MultiLineString

network.error: Network error. Check your connection and reload the page?
network.serverError: Server error, please reload the page and try again in a few minutes.
network.checkConnection: Check your connection and reload the page?

modification.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you would like to delete this modification? All external references (example: phasing) to this modification will also be cleared.
modification.clearBundleInfo: If you deleted the GTFS bundle underlying this modification, you will need to clear the bundle or delete this modification.
modification.importFromProjectInfo: When importing from a project associated with a different bundle, only "Add Trips" modifications will be copied. If a modification uses an existing stop from the baseline GTFS, it will be replaced in the imported modification by a new stop at the same location.
modification.name: Modification name
modification.onlyOneRoute: Only one route will be shown on the map at a time, even if multiple routes are selected below.

copyTimetable.noSegments: The modification being copied to and/or from does not have any segments. The default segment speed of %(segmentSpeed) km/h will be used.
copyTimetable.curHasMoreSegments: The modification of the timetable you are copying from has less segments than the modification you are copying to. The segment speeds will be copied %(numSegments) segment(s) and after that, the default segment speed of %(segmentSpeed) km/h will be used.
copyTimetable.curHasLessSegments: The modification of the timetable you are copying to has less segments than the modification you are copying from. The segment speeds will be copied %(numSegments) segment(s).

modification.selectStopInstructions: Click 'New', then draw a polygon around the stops you wish to select.
modification.dwellTimeDescription: The default time table dwell time will be used for each stop that does not have a custom one set.

addedSegments.confirmSpeedChange: Setting the average speed will affect speeds for all added segments. Do you wish to continue?
addedSegments.confirmTimeChange: Setting the total travel time will affect speeds for all added segments. Do you wish to continue?

opportunityDatasets.confirmLODES: LEHD LODES data are only available for the United States.  Are you sure you want to fetch these data?
opportunityDatasets.confirmDelete: Are you sure you would like to delete this dataset?
opportunityDatasets.confirmDeleteSource: Are you sure you would like to delete all opportunity datasets from this source?

analysis.createGridTooltip: Upload a .csv (with lat, lon, and at least one additional numeric column), a .grid file, or the files making up a shapefile (unzipped .shp .shx .dbf and .prj).
analysis.errorsInProject: Errors were found in the project:
analysis.warningsInProject: Warnings were found applying the project
analysis.probabilityImprovement: Show areas with probability of change > %01.2f
analysis.disableRegionalAnalysis: Fetch results for a single point before running a regional analysis
analysis.comparisonAccessToInstantaneous: compared with %(opportunity) within %(cutoff) minutes (average instantaneous accessibility)
analysis.bundleOutOfDate: Selected date %(selectedDate) is out of service for project %(project). Its bundle %(bundle) only has service between %(serviceStart) and %(serviceEnd). There may also be days in between without service. Please be certain of your GTFS service dates and select an appropriate one below.
analysis.willUpdate: Accessibility will update after fetching results.

fetchStatus.INITIALIZING_CLUSTER: Initializing compute cluster (may take several minutes)

analysis.weightedAverageAccessibilityWarning: Weighted average accessibility may not be representative of the experience of users of the system; we recommend using the histogram and percentile measures above.
analysis.disableFetch: Select a project before fetching results

customizeProfileRequest.label: Customize Profile Request
customizeProfileRequest.description: Edit JSON directly that will be sent to the worker. For advanced users only. Notice that "percentiles" and "workerVersion" cannot be changed here.
customizeProfileRequest.error: Not saved due to invalid JSON.

report.keepTripsOutside: Existing trips outside modified windows are kept.

adjustSpeed.selectInstructions: Select the stop-to-stop segment(s) of the pattern(s) to scale the speed on.
